content: The selected groups will be deleted. Users in the groups will not be removed from {{productName}}. Are you sure you want to continue?

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when deleting groups, informing users that their groups will be deleted but not themselves. The message appears in a dialog box. Translators should focus on conveying a clear warning of the consequences of deletion.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Վստա՞հ' is potentially misspelled. It seems like an attempt to create a question, but the correct form would be 'վստահ եք'.

The phrase "続けてよろしいですか？" (Tsudzuke yo roshi desu ka?) is a very formal and somewhat unnatural way to ask "Are you sure you want to continue?" in this context. It can sound overly polite or even slightly awkward. A more natural and conversational equivalent would be something like "よろしいですか？" (Yoroshii desu ka?) or "それでよろしいですか？" (Sore de yoroshii desu ka?).
The word 'ຖືກ' appears multiple times and might be redundant. While grammatically correct, it can sound awkward in Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to reduce redundancy. For example, replacing one or more instances of 'ຖືກ' with a more concise phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ດໍາເນີນຕໍ່' is somewhat formal and could be improved for a more conversational tone in this context. It translates literally as 'continue to proceed'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'ຕ້ອງການດົນື່ງບໍ?' (Do you want to do this?) or 'ຕ້ອງການຈະເຮັດຕໍ່ບໍ?' (Do you want to continue doing this?)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Are you sure you want to continue?' is translated as 'Weet u zeker dat u door wilt gaan?'. While understandable, a more natural and common phrasing in Dutch would be 'Bent u zeker dat u verder wilt gaan?' or 'Bent u zeker dat u hiermee door wilt gaan?'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bent u zeker dat u verder wilt gaan?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Utilizatorii care fac parte din grupurile' is grammatically awkward. It could be more concisely phrased.
The use of 'Sigur doriţi' is slightly formal for a confirmation dialog.  A more common and conversational phrasing would be better.
The word 'ඉවත්' is repeated excessively. While grammatically correct, it can be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් සමූහ ඉවත් කරනු ලැබේ. එම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් {{productName}} වෙතින් නොමැකෙනු ලැබේ. ඔබට ඉදිරියට යාමට අවශ්‍යද?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'removed from' is best translated with a more accurate equivalent in Sinhala. 'ඉවත් කරනු නොලැබේ' is technically correct, but 'මැකෙනු ලැබේ' (mekenuweva) or 'දහස්වන' (dahasvane) conveys the idea of not being deleted more precisely.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තෝරාගත් සමූහ ඉවත් කරනු ලැබේ. එම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් {{productName}} වෙතින් නොමැකෙනු ලැබේ. ඔබට ඉදිරියට යාමට අවශ්‍යද?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'removed from' is not ideal. 'Odstránení' implies a more forceful or complete removal than 'not removed'. A better translation might focus on the continued existence of users in the system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vybrané skupiny budú vymazané. Používatelia v skupinách zostanú v {{productName}}. Ste si istí, že chcete pokračovať?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Одабране групе' should be 'Одабране групе'. The adjective 'одабране' needs to agree in number with the noun 'групе'.
The phrase 'са {{productName}}-а' is grammatically awkward. The preposition 'са' isn't quite right in this context. It should be 'из {{productName}}'.

The phrase 'простору {{productName}}' translates to 'space {{productName}}' which is not accurate in this context. It implies a physical space rather than the platform or system where {{productName}} exists. It should convey that users will not be removed *from* the platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вибрані групи буде видалено. Користувачів у цих групах не буде видалено з {{productName}}. Ви впевнені, що бажаєте продовжити?
